info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Kimball, western Banner, southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gun Barrel, or 31 miles northeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Albin, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Meriden Rest Area, Hawk Springs Campground and Gun Barrel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
